input:
Comment: I agree and already do that and have for many years now. Still, the drastic change going off DST is very noticeable here in south central AK. Doing outdoor exercise in the gloom and dark of a snowless November is getting really old. I love when we go back on DST in the spring. It's is amazing to be out on the snow until 9-10 and still have light.

I do love being out during the winter nights with snow. A full moon is a magical experience when there is snow on the ground. I take advantage of that every chance it get. But, this fall is already getting to me. So dark out with cloudy skies and freezing rain really, really sucks.
